xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Mail Translations
xwikidoc.content: ### Missing: admin.email=Mail ### Missing: admin.email.description=Configure mail sending parameters and view mail statuses. ### Missing: admin.emailgeneral=Advanced ### Missing: admin.emailgeneral.description=Configure advanced mail parameters, like mail address obfuscation. ### Missing: admin.emailsend=Mail Sending ### Missing: admin.emailsend.description=Configure mail sending parameters. ### Missing: admin.emailstatus=Mail Sending Status ### Missing: admin.emailstatus.description=View the statuses of sent mails and resend mails that resulted in failure. ### Missing: admin.emailstatus.hint=If you can't find the status of a mail then it may be because the property which sent the mail did not specify that mail status should persist. ### Missing: Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate=Obfuscate Email Addresses ### Missing: Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate.hint=This only affects the email addresses stored in object properties of type Email, as long as the default custom displayer for the Email property type is not overwritten. Example: a...@domain.org ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from=Email address to send from ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from.hint=The default email address used to send notification emails from ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc=BCC email addresses ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc.hint=A default comma-separated list of BCC email addresses to use when sending mail ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host=Email Server ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host.hint=The SMTP server to send to. Defaults to "localhost" ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port=Email Server Port ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port.hint=The port of the SMTP server to use. Defaults to 25 ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username=Email Server Username ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username.hint=The username to connect to the SMTP server, only when authentication is required ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password=Email Server Password ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password.hint=The password to connect to the SMTP server, only when authentication is required ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties=Additional Properties ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties.hint=The list of additional JavaMail properties to use (e.g. "mail.smtp.starttls.enable=true" for TLS) ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_sendWaitTime=Send Wait Time ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_sendWaitTime.hint=The delay between each mail being sent, in milliseconds (defaults to 8 seconds) ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_discardSuccessStatuses=Discard Success Statuses? ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_discardSuccessStatuses.hint=No matter whether mail statuses are kept or not for mail that has been sent successfully (defaults to true) ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.date=Date ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.batchId=Batch ID ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.type=Type ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.recipients=Recipients ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.state=Status ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.wiki=Wiki ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.error=Error ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.actions=Actions ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.resend=Resend ### Missing: mailSender.admin.resendSuccess=The mail has been resent successfully ### Missing: mailSender.admin.resendFailure=Failed to resend. Click for more details.
